name: Arc (itch) (Nel Daues)
description:
With nothing in sight except horizon and open ocean, what will the crew of this little Arc do?

A Secret Santa Bitsy for the one and only Candle! *large amounts of deafening applause*

And a thank you to:

Bitsy, by Adam le Doux

Borksy, by Ayolland

"End from dialogue", by mildmojo

"Transparent Sprites", by Sean S. LeBlanc

Prompted with flood, community, and revolution
